(999x1+0)/1 mod 1024 = 999. (999x3+1)/2 mod 512 = 475. (999x9+5)/4 mod 256 = 201. (999x27+19)/8 mod 128 = 46. (999x27+19)/16 mod 64 = 23. (999x81+73)/32 mod 32 = 3. (999x243+251)/64 mod 16 = 5. (999x729+817)/128 mod 8 = 0. (999x729+817)/256 mod 4 = 0. (999x729+817)/512 mod 2 = 0. (999x729+817)/1024 mod 1 = 0.
